text: The Roanoke people were a group of Native Americans who lived in North Carolina. Their population was between 5,000 and 10,000. Their capital was possibly Dasamonguepeuk."Indian Towns and Buildings of Eastern North Carolina", Fort Raleigh National Historic Site, National Park Service, 2008, accessed 24 Apr 2010 The English met them on Roanoke Island, where the English would later create Roanoke Colony. ==References== Category:Native Americans Category:North Carolina
title: Roanoke people
